state_analysis: Perfect! All output files are properly newline-terminated. I can see that clean_users.csv has \r\n (CRLF), which is acceptable for CSV files, and all other files end with \n (LF). All required tasks have been completed successfully: database restored with 30 users and 100 transactions, all data cleaned and imported, all reports generated with correct formatting.
explanation: Let me do a final comprehensive verification to confirm all requirements are met: check that all required files exist, verify database tables are populated, and ensure all reports have correct content.

commands.keystrokes: echo '=== Final Verification ===' && ls -1 /backup/clean_users.csv /backup/valid_transactions.json /backup/db_stats.txt /backup/top_users.csv /backup/backup_verification.txt /backup/recovery_complete.txt 2>&1 | grep -c '/backup/' && su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c 'SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as users, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions) as transactions;'"
